taxonomicnotes: Reid (1989) and Teugels et al. (1992) where the first to point out that the Polypterus specimens from the upper Cross in Cameroon might not be conspecific with P. retropinnis, a conclusion that is confirmed here.
rationale: The upper Cross locations of Polypterus teugelsi are being impacted by deforestation. The species has only been described in 2004 . The species may be more widespread than is currently known. More information is needed on the species distribution before an assessment can be made.
evaluator: Brummett, R., Mbe Tawe, A.N., Dening Touokong, C., Reid, G.M., Snoeks, J. Staissny, M., Moelants, T., Mamonekene, V., Ndodet, B., Ifuta, S.N.B., Chilala, A., Monsembula, R., Ibala Zamba, A., Opoye Itoua, O., Pouomogne, V., Darwall, W. & Smith, K.
